name:
Raging Demon Kimono Gi
街頭惡魔
description: Dynasty's Deluxe Training Kimono Gi for Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, Karate, and all other uses. Each kimono is loaded with high quality industry-leading features that elite practitioners have come to expect, while staying 100% authentic and true to our identity. So you wanna be a street fighter? The Raging Demon 街頭惡魔 kimono gi celebrates one of the most bad ass video game characters that ever existed. Now you can finally own and roll in this one of a kind design! Features: * Navy blue dye * Red contrast stitching / embroidery Jacket: * 450gsm lightweight Pearl Weave fabric jacket * Rubber foam collar * Tailored cut & fit * Dynasty "Renaissance Wave" inner taping Pants: * 10oz rip stop cotton pants * Heavy duty rope tie w/ 6x loop holes * Reinforced stitch crotch * Tailored cut & fit * Dynasty "Renaissance Wave" inner taping Artwork: * One Thousand Hits In An Instant 一瞬千擊 * Heaven 天 * Purification 禊 * Dynasty "D" fireballs Limited quantities. Please check our FAQs, size chart, and care instructions before purchasing. Model is 6'0, 155lbs. wearing size A2.

name:
Legendary Spirit
一代宗師
description: Dynasty "Designer Series" Grappling Wear for Mixed Martial Artists, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu practitioners, and elite athletes alike. Each piece is constructed with focus on quality, comfort, and uncompromising performance. Without him, none of us would be here. Inspired by the one and only grandmaster, the original mixed martial artist, and dubbed "The Father of Mixed Martial Arts" by UFC President Dana White, Bruce Lee's philosophy and charisma have gone on to inspire millions for decades to come. Carry on his legendary spirit with this full collector's set! (This is an unofficial product designed by Dynasty and inspired by the legend himself. No copyright or infringement is intended.) Features: * Classic yellow & black * Black reinforced stitch Rash Guard: * Poly / spandex blend for comfort and performance * Sublimated art will never fade * Dynasty "Luxury" Pattern Fight Shorts: * For competition, training, or leisure * Microfiber construction * Rubber waist strap velcro panel for a secure fit * Rubber grip waist with drawstring tie * Stretch waistband for dynamic fit * Stretch crotch panel for maximum mobility * Split leg seams for maximum mobility * Dynasty "Luxury" Pattern Grappling Spats: * Poly / spandex blend for comfort and performance * Sublimated art will never fade * Dynasty "Luxury" Pattern Artwork: * "踢打摔拿 Strike Wrestle Submit" Chinese MMA logo. * "以無法為有法, 以無很為有佷 Using No Way As Way, Using No Limitation As Limitation". Model is 6'0, 155lbs. wearing size MEDIUM for all products. Please check size charts before purchasing.

name:
Heavenly Void
空無
description: Dynasty's Deluxe Competition Hanfu for Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, Karate, and Kung Fu. Each hanfu is loaded with high quality industry-leading features that elite Brazilian Jiu Jitsu players have come to expect, while staying 100% authentic and true to our identity. The purity of the heavens is harnessed in our Heavenly Void 空無 hanfu. The concept of the "void" or "emptiness" is found in Chinese Buddhism and also explained in Miyamoto Musashi's "The Book of Five Rings". Having attained true mastery of martial arts, one can reach the state of enlightenment, being completely in the moment of battle and capable of reacting without thought. The light fabric of this hanfu enables one to move swiftly and effortlessly, much like the wind that soars across the seas or the clouds that float above the skies. Features: * Classic white * Sky blue contrast stitching / embroidery Jacket: * 350gsm lightweight Pearl Weave fabric jacket * Rubber foam collar * Tailored cut & fit * Dynasty "Renaissance Wave" inner taping Pants: * 10oz rip stop cotton pants * Heavy duty rope tie w/ 6x loop holes * Reinforced stitch crotch * Tailored cut & fit * Dynasty "Renaissance Wave" inner taping Artwork: * Qi Blasts * Swirling Vortexes * Striding Cloud * Void 無 Limited quantities. Please check our FAQs, size chart, and care instructions before purchasing. Model is 5'8, 155lbs. wearing size A2.

name:
Bushido Virtue
武士道
description: Dynasty "Designer Series" Grappling Wear for Mixed Martial Artists, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu practitioners, and elite athletes alike. Each piece is constructed with focus on quality, comfort, and uncompromising performance. The Bushido Virtue Armor 武士道 by Dynasty continues our tradition of fusing full-body artwork with wearable sports performance fabrics. Inspired by Tom Cruise's crimson liquorice colored samurai armor from The Last Samurai 最後武士, this eye-grabbing design features detailed armored plating, traditional Katana and Wakizashi samurai swords equipped on the hip, "Bushido 武士道" on the sleeve, "Soul 魂" as in "Japanese Spirit 大和魂" on the back neck, and the seven virtues of Bushido on the back spine. Righteousness (義), Courage (勇氣), Benevolence (仁), Respect (禮), Honesty (誠), Honour (名誉), Loyalty (忠).

name:
Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon
臥虎藏龍
MMA Shorts
description: Complete the Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon 臥虎藏龍 look with our very own pair of "vale tudo" MMA Compression Shorts. Artwork features a Chinese watercolor painting backdrop with fierce hand-drawn dragon body art, inspired by full body Japanese Yakuza style tattoos. This set is not for the weak! Note: Compression Shorts utilize a stretch-to-fit fabric to maximize athletic mobility. You may need to order a size down for a true-to-body fit, see our size chart for details.

name:
Coral Dragon
聖闘士星矢紫龍星座
description: Dynasty "Designer Series" Grappling Wear for Mixed Martial Artists, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu practitioners, and elite athletes alike. Each piece is constructed with focus on quality, comfort, and uncompromising performance. The Coral Dragon Saint Armor 聖闘士星矢紫龍星座 by Dynasty leaves no stone unturned and no detail left behind. Inspired by Dragon Shiryu from the 1980s Japanese anime "Saint Seiya", also known as "Knights of the Zodiac" in North America. It features Dragon Shiryu's all-piercing dragon fist on the right, the indestructible and impenetrable dragon shield on the left, the dragon claw shoulder plate, and the cosmic dragon tattoo on the back spine.

name:
Kung Fu Respect
功夫
description: [ MMA Collection ] Our core collection of martial arts themed tees. The Kung Fu Respect by Dynasty features the hand gesture used in Chinese Kung Fu and martial arts as a greeting or show of respect. A timeless design that will never go out of style. * Screen printed on a 100% cotton American Apparel crew neck tee, the highest quality and most comfortable cotton fashion tee you'll ever wear.
